contentrichtext.text: '''Shevonne Durkin''' is an American actress who was born in 1969, and starred in the 1994 horror movie ''[[Leprechaun 2]]''. ==Filmography== * 1992 [[The Wonder Years]] – [[The Wonder Years (season 5)|Season 5 episode]]: Double Double Date - Inga Finnstrom * 1992 Rage and Honor - Groupie * 1993 [[The Liars' Club]] - Marla Matthews * 1993 Le tueur du futur - Carol Maibaum * 1994 Huck and the King of Hearts - Mavis * 1994 [[Leprechaun 2]] - Bridget Callum * 1994 Dead at 21 (TV series) - Hotel California (1994)- Fire * 1994 Les dessous de Palm Beach (TV series) – Ask the Dust (1994) - Schoo * 1994 Magic Kid II - Venus * 1994 [[Tammy and the T-Rex]] - Wendy * 1998 Beverly Hills (TV series) – Reunion (1998) - Fay * 1998 La croisière s'amuse, nouvelle vague (TV series) – All Aboard (1998) - Joan * 1999 Speedway Jane - Bridget * 2001 Folly Island Hideaway - Brianne ==External links== * {{IMDb name|0244193}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Durkin, Shevonne | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American actor | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Durkin, Shevonne}} [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:American television actors]] {{US-screen-actor-stub}}
